Element.Description: BEAst: Identifies the BII profile or business process context in which the transaction appears. There are two ProfileIDs defined for the Advanced Despatch Advice. One profile is used when the receiver of the Despatch Advice is expected to return a response message, the other is used when no response message is used. Possible choices are: "urn:fdc:peppol.eu:logistics:bis:despatch_advice_only:1" and "urn:fdc:peppol.eu:logistics:bis:despatch_advice_w_receipt_advice:1"
BEAst: The date when the Advanced Despatch Advice is issued. Format = "YYYY-MM-DD". Together with ID and IssueTime the IssueDate forms the identity of the Version of the Advanced Despatch Advice.
BEAst: The time when the Advanced Despatch Advice is issued. Format = "hh:mm:ss+timezone". Timezone is optional to use. If omitted, the local timezone where the document was issued should be assumed.

Element.Name: Despatch advice status code
Element.Description: BEAst: A code signifying the status of the Despatch Advice. Default is Original (9)

Element.Name: Despatch advice type code
Element.Description: BEAst: A code signifying the type of the Despatch Advice. Default is Advice of despatch of goods (1)
BEAst: A textual note for the dispatch as whole.
BEAst: Can be included here or at Line level.

Element.Name: Additional document reference
Element.Description: BEAst: Reference to additional documents relevant for this Despatch advice. Can also be used for additional information on header level.

Element.Name: Identity of the reference
Element.Description: BEAst: The reference number of added document

Element.Name: Document type code
Element.Description: BEAst: The type of reference. Must me part of UNCL1001. At least one of Document Type Code and Document Type must be used.

Element.Name: Document type
Element.Description: BEAst: The type of reference that cannot be specified by a code. At least one of Document Type Code and Document Type must be used.

Element.Name: Attachment
Element.Description: BEAst: Group to describe an attached document. An attachment can refer to an external document or be included with the document being exchanged.

Element.Name: Embedded binary object
Element.Description: BEAst: The referenced document can here be inserted as a binary object.

Element.Name: External reference
Element.Description: BEAst: A reference to an attached document that is external to the document(s) being exchanged.

Element.Name: Address to internet resource
Element.Description: BEAst: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies the external object as an Internet resource.

BEAst: The Despatch Party is the person or organization who provides (despatch) the goods or services. It also defines the sender of the Advanced Despatch Advice. The role is carried out by the supplier or on behalf of the supplier. The real ship-from address must be provided in the Despatch Address when the Advanced Despatch Advice describes a movement.

Element.Name: Party Name
Element.Description: BEAst: The name of the Despatch Supplier Party.

Element.Name: Name of the fuel supplier
Element.Description: BEAst: The Despatch Supplier.

Element.Name: Party tax scheme
Element.Description: BEAst: The tax information about the Despatch Party.

Element.Name: Company ID
Element.Description: BEAst: The Despatch Party Value Added Tax identifer.

Element.Name: Tax scheme identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Tax scheme identifier. E.g. "VAT" or "GST".

Element.Name: Despatching party's legal name.
Element.Description: BEAst: The legal name of the Despatching party.

Element.Name: Despatch supplier parties legal registration ID.
Element.Description: BEAst: The official identity of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The identification scheme identifier of the despatch supplier legal registration identifier

Element.Name: City name
Element.Description: BEAst: The name of the city.

Element.Name: Contry
Element.Description: BEAst: The residens country for the despatch party.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: BEAst: Country Code

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: BEAst: The contact of the Despatch supplier party.

Element.Name: Contact name
Element.Description: BEAst: The contact name.

Element.Name: Contact email telephone
Element.Description: BEAst: The phone number of the contact.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: BEAst: The electronic mail of the contact.

BEAst: The Consignee is the person or organization to which the products will be shipped and who is taking possession. It also defines the receiver of the Advanced Despatch Advice. The role is carried out by the customer or on behalf of the customer. The real ship-to address must be provided in the delivery location if the Advanced Despatch Advice describes a movement. If the Despatch address describes a service provided at a specific location, the Delivery Location contains this location.

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: BEAst: The name of the Delivery Customer Party.

Element.Name: Name of the fuel supplier
Element.Description: BEAst: The Despatch Supplier.

Element.Name: Party tax scheme
Element.Description: BEAst: The tax information about the Delivery Party.

Element.Name: Company ID
Element.Description: BEAst: The Delivery Party Value Added Tax identifer.

Element.Name: Tax scheme identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Tax scheme identifier. E.g. "VAT" or "GST".

Element.Name: Consignee party's Legal name.
Element.Description: BEAst: The Legal Name of the Receiving party.

Element.Name: Delivery customers parties legal registration ID.
Element.Description: BEAst: The official identity of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The identification scheme identifier of the despatch customer legal registration identifier

Element.Name: City name
Element.Description: BEAst: The name of the city.

Element.Name: Contry
Element.Description: BEAst: The residens country for the delivery customer party.

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: BEAst: The contact of the Delivery customer party.

Element.Name: Contact name
Element.Description: BEAst: The contact name.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: BEAst: The phone number of the contact.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: BEAst: The electronic mail of the contact.

Element.Name: Party tax scheme
Element.Description: BEAst: The tax information about the Buyer Party.

Element.Name: Company ID
Element.Description: BEAst: The Buyer Party Value Added Tax identifer.

Element.Name: Tax scheme identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Tax scheme identifier. E.g. "VAT" or "GST".

Element.Name: Buyer party's Legal name.
Element.Description: BEAst: The Legal Name of the Buying party.

Element.Name: Buyer party's legal registration ID.
Element.Description: BEAst: The official identity of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The identification scheme identifier of the Buyer's legal registration identifier

Element.Name: City name
Element.Description: BEAst: The name of the city.

Element.Name: Contry
Element.Description: BEAst: The residens country for the Buyer party.

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: BEAst: The contact of the Buyer party.

Element.Name: Contact name
Element.Description: BEAst: The contact name.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: BEAst: The phone number of the contact.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: BEAst: The electronic mail of the contact.

Element.Name: Party tax scheme
Element.Description: BEAst: The tax information about the Seller Party.

Element.Name: Company ID
Element.Description: BEAst: The Seller Party Value Added Tax identifer.

Element.Name: Tax scheme identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Tax scheme identifier. E.g. "VAT" or "GST".

Element.Name: Selling party's legal name.
Element.Description: BEAst: The legal name of the Selling party.

Element.Name: Seller party's legal registration ID.
Element.Description: BEAst: The official identity of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The identification scheme identifier of Seller's legal registration identifier

Element.Name: City name
Element.Description: BEAst: The name of the city.

Element.Name: Contry
Element.Description: BEAst: The residens country for the Seller party.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: BEAst: Country Code

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: BEAst: The contact of the Seller party.

Element.Name: Contact name
Element.Description: BEAst: The contact name.

Element.Name: Contact email telephone
Element.Description: BEAst: The phone number of the contact.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: BEAst: The electronic mail of the contact.
BEAst: For 3PL shipments, this party defines the final receiver of the goods.
BEAst: Identifies a shipment. Freight forwarders reference number.
BEAst: Used by Logistics for Supplier Remark.
BEAst: The gross weight of the despatch as a whole. Must be equal the the weight specified for the included transport handling unites if this is specified
BEAst: The gross volume of the despatch as a whole. Must be greather or equal to the the volume specified for the included transport handling units if this is specified

Element.Name: Declared statistics value amount
Element.Description: BEAst: The total declared value for customs purposes of those goods in this shipment that are subject to the same customs procedure and have the same tariff/statistical heading, country information, and duty regime.

Attribute.Name: Currency identifier
Attribute.Description: BEAst: Currency identifier.

Element.Description: BEAst: Use a dummy value since this element is mandatory.

Element.Name: Hazardous risk indicator
Element.Description: BEAst: An indication that the transported goods in this consignment are subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

Element.Name: Handling code
Element.Description: BEAst: The handling required for this shipment, expressed as a code. Use TRED4079, BeastHandlingCode or an another code id as listID.

Attribute.Name: Identifier for codelist for handling code
Attribute.Description: BEAst: An identifier for the codelist used for the handling code

Element.Name: Handling instructions
Element.Description: BEAst: The handling required for this consignment, expressed as text.

Element.Name: Party identification
Element.Description: BEAst: This party defines the company providing the transport service

Element.Name: Carrying party identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Identifies the Carrier party.

Element.Name: Carrier Party Name
Element.Description: BEAst: The name of the Carrier party.

Element.Name: Carrier party name
Element.Description: BEAst: The name of the Carrier party.

Element.Name: Postal Address
Element.Description: BEAst: The address of the Carrier Party.

Element.Name: Street name
Element.Description: BEAst: The name of the Street.

Element.Name: Additional Street name
Element.Description: BEAst: Second line of the address.

Element.Name: City name
Element.Description: BEAst: The name of the City.

Element.Name: Postal Zone
Element.Description: BEAst: The Zip-code.

Element.Name: Country Subentity
Element.Description: BEAst: The county or similar.

Element.Name: Line
Element.Description: BEAst: An additional address line.

Element.Name: Country identification code
Element.Description: BEAst: The country code.

Element.Name: Party tax scheme
Element.Description: BEAst: The tax information for the Carrier Party.

Element.Name: Company ID
Element.Description: BEAst: The Carrier Party Value Added Tax identifer.

Element.Name: Tax scheme identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Tax scheme identifier. E.g. "VAT" or "GST".

Element.Name: Carrier party's legal name.
Element.Description: BEAst: The legal name of the Carrier party.

Element.Name: Carrier supplier parties legal registration ID.
Element.Description: BEAst: The official identity of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The identification scheme identifier of the Carrier party's legal registration identifier

Element.Name: City name
Element.Description: BEAst: The name of the city.

Element.Name: Contry
Element.Description: BEAst: The residens country for the Carrier party.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: BEAst: Country Code

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: BEAst: The contact of the Carrier party.

Element.Name: Contact name
Element.Description: BEAst: The contact name.

Element.Name: Contact email telephone
Element.Description: BEAst: The phone number of the contact.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: BEAst: The electronic mail of the contact.

Element.Name: Original despatch transportation service
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to specify Fuel consumption and Environmental Emission.

Element.Name: Tranport service code
Element.Description: BEAst: Use "FuelReport" since this element is mandatory.

Element.Name: Transport equipment
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to specify fuel consumption. To be repeated for all fuel types used.

Element.Name: Tranport equipment type code
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to specify the type of fuel.

Attribute.Name: List Identifier
Attribute.Description: BEAst: Identifies the codelist.

Attribute.Name: List Agency Identifier
Attribute.Description: BEAst: Identifies the Agency that issues the Type-code.

Attribute.Name: List Version Identifier
Attribute.Description: BEAst: Identifies the version of the List.

Element.Name: Description
Element.Description: BEAst: Fuel description.

Element.Name: Fuel measurements
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to specify information about the fuel and fuel consumption.

Element.Name: Attribute identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: To define the type of measurement. EnergyContent, ConversionFactor, FuelConsumption, DrivingDistance, DrivingTime, FuelMeasurementMethod, EngineType, RenewableFuel.

Element.Name: Measure
Element.Description: BEAst: The measured value. Used for EnergyContent, ConversionFactor, FuelConsumption, DrivingDistance, DrivingTime and RenewableFuel. unitCode refers to T6706.

Attribute.Name: Measure unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to the measure.

Element.Name: Attribute value
Element.Description: BEAst: Description of the attribute when there is no value to measure. Used for FuelMeasurementMethod and EngineType. Possible values are for FuelMeasurementMethod: "AutomaticMeasurement", "StandardEstimate", "ManualMeasurement" and for EngineType: "Euro2", "Euro3", "Euro4", "Euro5", "Euro6", "EuroStep2", "EuroStep3A", "EuroStep3B", "EuroStep4", "EV", "FuelCell", "Hybrid".

Element.Name: Provider party
Element.Description: BEAst: To define the fuel supplier.

Element.Name: Party identification
Element.Description: BEAst: To identify the fuel supplier.

Element.Name: Identity of the fuel supplier
Element.Description: BEAst: The fuel supplier.

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: BEAst: The name of the fuel supplier.

Element.Name: Name of the fuel supplier
Element.Description: BEAst: The fuel supplier.

Element.Name: Goods item
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to specify the type of fuel.

Element.Name: Item
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to specify the type of fuel.

Element.Name: Seller's item identification
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to specify the type of fuel.

Element.Name: Supplier's identity of the fuel
Element.Description: BEAst: The fuel article number.

Element.Name: Standard item identification
Element.Description: BEAst: Only one Standard Item Number can be used. Specify the type of standard in schemeID.

Element.Name: Standard article identity of the fuel
Element.Description: BEAst: The fuel article number. The schemeID refers to the Article Number Type.

Element.Name: Environmental emission
Element.Description: BEAst: To report the emissions.

Element.Name: Environmental emission type code
Element.Description: BEAst: Defines the type of emission reported. Values: "CO2" (Carbon Dioxide), NOX (Nitrogen Oxide), PM (Particulate Matter), HC (Hydro Carbon).

Attribute.Name: Identifier for codelist for environmental emissions type
Attribute.Description: BEAst: An identifier for the codelist used for the environmental emission type code

Element.Name: Value of measurement
Element.Description: BEAst: The value of the emission. Refers to Carbon Dioxide/Nitrogen Oxide/Particulate Matter/Hydro Carbon.

Attribute.Name: Measure unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to measure.

Element.Name: Shipment stage
Element.Description: BEAst: The shipment stage for the last mile of the delivery

Element.Name: Transport mode code
Element.Description: BEAst: Must be a value in UNECERec19.

Element.Name: Transport means type code
Element.Description: BEAst: The means of transport used in this shipment stage.

Element.Name: Transport means
Element.Description: BEAst: A code signifying the type of this means of transport (truck, vessel, etc.) used in this shipment stage.

Element.Name: Air transport
Element.Description: BEAst: An aircraft used in this shipment stage.

Element.Name: Air transport identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: An identifer for a specific aircraft.

Element.Name: Road transport
Element.Description: BEAst: Description of a truck or a vehicle transporting the goods. Use only if Transport mode code is set to road transport

Element.Name: License plate identifier transport
Element.Description: BEAst: The licence plate(s) identifying the vehicle seperated by semicolon if there are more than one.

Element.Name: Rail transport
Element.Description: BEAst: Equipment used for rail transport in this shipment stage.

Element.Name: Train identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: An identifier for the train used as the means of transport.

Element.Name: Rail car identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: An identifier for the rail car on the train used as the means of transport..

Element.Name: Maritime transport
Element.Description: BEAst: Description of a truck or a vehicle transporting the goods. Use only if TransportModeCode is set to maritime transport.

Element.Name: Vessel identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: The registred identifier of the vessel

Element.Name: Measurement dimension
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to specify any measurement of the Transport Means.

Element.Name: Attribute identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: To describe the type of measurement. Use UNCL 6313 subset.

Element.Name: Measure
Element.Description: BEAst: For the measure. Use UN/ECE Recommendation 20 and 21.subset.

Element.Name: Actual Delivery Date
Element.Description: BEAst: The date on which the supply of goods or services was made or completed according to the delivery term. Used only when Advanced Despatch Advice is sent after delivery. Format = "YYYY-MM-DD"

Element.Name: Actual Delivery Time
Element.Description: BEAst: The date on which the supply of goods or services was made or completed according to the delivery term. Used only when Advanced Despatch Advice is sent after delivery. Format = "hh:mm:ss+timezone". Timezone is optional to use. If omitted, the local timezone where the delivery was made should be assumed.

Element.Name: Delivery location
Element.Description: BEAst: The Delivery Location is used to define the Ship-to when the Delivery Customer Party is not. If Delivery Location is omitted, the Delivery Customer Party is the actual Delivery Location. When the Despatch Advice describes a movement, the Delivery Location should always be included. When the Despatch Advice describes a service given at a location, the Delivery Location describes this location.

Element.Name: Identity of the delivery location
Element.Description: BEAst: Identifies the delivery location.

Element.Name: Name of the delivery location
Element.Description: BEAst: The name of the delivery location.

Element.Name: Address of the delivery location
Element.Description: BEAst: The address of the delivery location.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: BEAst: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: BEAst: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: BEAst: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: BEAst: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: BEAst: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: BEAst: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: BEAst: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Location coordinate
Element.Description: BEAst: To specify the coordinates.

Element.Name: Coordinate system code
Element.Description: BEAst: Always "EPSG:3857" by definition.

Element.Name: Latitude degrees
Element.Description: BEAst: The X coordinate. Use degrees with decimals.

Attribute.Name: Latitude degrees unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to the latitude degrees.

Element.Name: Longitude degrees
Element.Description: BEAst: The Y coordinate. Use degrees with decimals.

Attribute.Name: Longitude degrees unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to the longitude degrees.

Element.Name: Altitude
Element.Description: BEAst: The Z coordinate.

Attribute.Name: Altitude unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to altitude.

Element.Description: BEAst: Used only when Advanced Despatch Advice is sent before delivery.
BEAst: The Start time of the period. Format = "hh:mm:ss+timezone". Timezone is optional to use. If omitted, the local timezone where the delivery is made should be assumed.
BEAst: The End time of the period. Format = "hh:mm:ss+timezone". Timezone is optional to use. If omitted, the local timezone where the delivery is made should be assumed.

BEAst: The actual or expected date when the shipment was dispatched from the dispatching party. Format = "hh:mm:ss+timezone". Timezone is optional to use. If omitted, the local timezone where the despatch was made should be assumed.
BEAst: The Despatch Address is used to define the Ship-from when the Despatch Supplier Party is not. When the Despatch Advice describes a movement, the Despatch Address should be included.
BEAst: An identifier for the location to which the goods and services are despatched. For example a global location number.

Element.Name: Location coordinate
Element.Description: BEAst: To specify the coordinates.

Element.Name: Coordinate system code
Element.Description: BEAst: Always "EPSG:3857" by definition.

Element.Name: Latitude degrees
Element.Description: BEAst: The X coordinate. Use degrees with decimals.

Attribute.Name: Latitude degrees unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to the latitude degrees.

Element.Name: Longitude degrees
Element.Description: BEAst: The Y coordinate. Use degrees with decimals.

Attribute.Name: Longitude degrees unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to the longitude degrees.

Element.Name: Altitude
Element.Description: BEAst: The Z coordinate.

Attribute.Name: Altitude unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to altitude.

Element.Name: Delivery terms
Element.Description: BEAst:

Element.Name: Delivery terms
Element.Description: BEAst: Delivery terms code (Inco terms).

Element.Name: Special terms
Element.Description: BEAst: Special delivery terms that exceeds the inco terms.

Element.Name: Delivery terms location
Element.Description: BEAst:

Element.Name: Delivery terms location
Element.Description: BEAst: Delivery terms location. The location to which the delivery terms refer. Used to qualify the delivery terms e.g. "Terms of delivery are FOB Rotterdam"

Element.Name: Transport handling unit
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to specify how the goods is packed.

Element.Name: Identifier transport handling unit
Element.Description: BEAst: The SSCC identification code of this Transport Handling Unit.

Element.Name: Handling unit type code
Element.Description: BEAst: Type of Transport Handling Unit. Use UN/ECE Recommendation 21.

Element.Name: Handling Code
Element.Description: BEAst: The handling for this transporthandling unit expressed as a code

Attribute.Name: Identifier for codelist for handling code
Attribute.Description: BEAst: An identifier for the codelist used for the handling code

Element.Name: Handling instructions
Element.Description: BEAst: The handling for this transporthandling unit expressed as a text

Element.Name: Handling unit hazardous indicator
Element.Description: BEAst: An indicator that the materials contained in this transport handling unit are subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

Element.Name: Shipping marks
Element.Description: BEAst: Free-form description of the marks and numbers on this transport handling unit.

Element.Name: Transport equipment
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to specify Transport Equipment details associated with this Transport Handling Unit.

Element.Name: Identifier transport equipment
Element.Description: BEAst: An id for the physical transport equipment e.g. a container number.

Element.Name: Tranport equipment type code
Element.Description: BEAst: An code specifying the type of equipment.

Element.Name: Size type code
Element.Description: BEAst: A code signifying the size and type of this piece of piece of transport equipment. When the piece of transport equipment is a shipping container, it is recommended to use ContainerSizeTypeCode for validation.

Element.Name: Indicator refrigeration transport equipment
Element.Description: BEAst: An indicator that this piece of transport equipments refrigeration is on (true) or off (false).

Element.Name: Description transport equipment
Element.Description: BEAst: A textual description of the transport equipment.
Element.Value: A 20 foot refrigerated container that is not actively controlling temperature of the product.

Element.Name: Power indicator transport equipment
Element.Description: BEAst: An indicator that this piece of transport equipment can supply power (true) or not (false).

Element.Name: Measurement dimension
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to specify any measurement of the Transport Handling Unit.

Element.Name: Attribute identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: To describe the type of measurement. Use UNCL 6313 subset.

Element.Name: Measure
Element.Description: BEAst: For the measure. Use UN/ECE Recommendation 20 and 21.subset.

Element.Name: Minimum temperature
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to specify the minimal temperature for the transport handling unit under the transport.

Element.Name: Attribute identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: To describe the type of messure that in this context is the minimal temperature.

Element.Name: Measure
Element.Description: BEAst: The value of the minimal temperature measurement.

Element.Name: Maximum temperature
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to specify the maximum temperature for the transport handling unit under the transport.

Element.Name: Attribute identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: To describe the type of messure that in this context is the maximal temperature.

Element.Name: Measure
Element.Description: BEAst: The value of the maximum temperature measurement.

Element.Name: Goods item
Element.Description: BEAst: A Goods item contained in the Transport Handling Unit.

Element.Name: Identifier goods item
Element.Description: BEAst: An identifier for this goods item. Refering to the Despatch Line

Element.Name: Hazardous risk indicator
Element.Description: BEAst: An indication that the transported goods item is subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

Element.Name: Declared statistics value amount
Element.Description: BEAst: The total declared value for customs purposes of the goods item.

Attribute.Name: Currency identifier
Attribute.Description: BEAst: Currency identifier.

Element.Name: Quantity
Element.Description: BEAst: The number of units making up this goods item.

Attribute.Name: Quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to the quantity.

Element.Name: Trace identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: An identifier to use for different purposes. Specify in schemeID which type of Trace ID you use.

Element.Name: Package information
Element.Description: BEAst: A package contained in the Transport Handling Unit.

Element.Name: Package identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: The Id of the package for instance a SSCC.

Element.Name: Returnable material indicator
Element.Description: BEAst: An indicator that the packaging material is returnable (true) or not (false).

Element.Name: Packaging type code
Element.Description: BEAst: A code signifying a level of packaging.

Element.Name: Packing material
Element.Description: BEAst: Text describing the packaging material.

Element.Name: Contained package
Element.Description: BEAst: A package contained in the Transport Handling Unit.

Element.Name: Identifier contained package
Element.Description: BEAst: The Id of the package for instance a SSCC.

Element.Name: Returnable material indicator
Element.Description: BEAst: An indicator that the packaging material is returnable (true) or not (false).

Element.Name: Packaging type code
Element.Description: BEAst: A code signifying a level of packaging.

Element.Name: Packing material
Element.Description: BEAst: Text describing the packaging material.

Element.Name: Contained package
Element.Description: BEAst: A package contained in the Transport Handling Unit.

Element.Name: Identifier contained package
Element.Description: BEAst: The Id of the package for instance a SSCC.

Element.Name: Returnable material indicator
Element.Description: BEAst: An indicator that the packaging material is returnable (true) or not (false).

Element.Name: Packaging type code
Element.Description: BEAst: A code signifying a level of packaging.

Element.Name: Packing material
Element.Description: BEAst: Text describing the packaging material.

Element.Name: Goods item
Element.Description: BEAst: A Goods item contained in the package.

Element.Name: Identifiser goods item
Element.Description: BEAst: An identifier for this goods item. Refering to the Despatch Line

Element.Name: Hazardous risk indicator
Element.Description: BEAst: An indication that the transported goods item is subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

Element.Name: Declared statistics value amount
Element.Description: BEAst: The total declared value for customs purposes of the goods item.

Attribute.Name: Currency identifier
Attribute.Description: BEAst: Currency identifier.

Element.Name: Quantity
Element.Description: BEAst: The number of units making up this goods item.

Attribute.Name: Quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to the quantity.

Element.Name: Trace identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: An identifier to use for different purposes. Specify in schemeID which type of Trace ID you use.

Element.Name: Measurement dimension
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to specify any measurement of this Package

Element.Name: Attribute identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: To describe the type of measurement. Use UNCL 6313 subset.

Element.Name: Measure
Element.Description: BEAst: For the measure.

Attribute.Name: Measure unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to the measure.

Element.Name: Goods item
Element.Description: BEAst: A Goods item contained in the package.

Element.Name: Identifier goods item
Element.Description: BEAst: An identifier for this goods item. Refering to the Despatch Line

Element.Name: Hazardous risk indicator
Element.Description: BEAst: An indication that the transported goods item is subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

Element.Name: Declared statistics value amount
Element.Description: BEAst: The total declared value for customs purposes of the goods item.

Attribute.Name: Currency identifier
Attribute.Description: BEAst: Currency identifier.

Element.Name: Quantity
Element.Description: BEAst: The number of units making up this goods item.

Attribute.Name: Quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to the quantity.

Element.Name: Trace identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: An identifier to use for different purposes. Specify in schemeID which type of Trace ID you use.

Element.Name: Measurement dimension
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to specify any measurement of this Package

Element.Name: Attribute identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: To describe the type of measurement.

Element.Name: Measure
Element.Description: BEAst: For the measure.

Attribute.Name: Measure unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to the measure.

Element.Name: Goods item
Element.Description: BEAst: A Goods item contained in the package.

Element.Name: Identifiser goods item
Element.Description: BEAst: An identifier for this goods item. Refering to the Despatch Line

Element.Name: Hazardous risk indicator
Element.Description: BEAst: An indication that the transported goods item is subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

Element.Name: Declared statistics value amount
Element.Description: BEAst: The total declared value for customs purposes of the goods item.

Attribute.Name: Currency identifier
Attribute.Description: BEAst: Currency identifier.

Element.Name: Quantity
Element.Description: BEAst: The number of units making up this goods item.

Attribute.Name: Quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to the quantity.

Element.Name: Trace identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: An identifier to use for different purposes. Specify in schemeID which type of Trace ID you use.

Element.Name: Measurement dimension
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to specify any measurement of this Package

Element.Name: Attribute identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: To describe the type of measurement. Use UNCL 6313 subset.

Element.Name: Measure
Element.Description: BEAst: For the measure.

Attribute.Name: Measure unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to the measure.

Element.Name: Sales order line number
Element.Description: BEAst: Reference to the sellers orderline number.

Element.Name: Sales order number
Element.Description: BEAst: Reference to the sellers order number.

Element.Name: Document reference
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for sending additional references at line level.

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: ID of the referenced document or item.

Element.Name: Document type code
Element.Description: BEAst: Identifies the type of document or item. At least one of Document Type Code and Document Type must be used.

Element.Name: Document type
Element.Description: BEAst: The type of reference that cannot be specified by a code. At least one of Document Type Code and Document Type must be used.

Element.Name: Attachment
Element.Description: BEAst: Group to describe an attached document. An attachment can refer to an external document or be included with the document being exchanged.

Element.Name: Embedded binary object
Element.Description: BEAst: The referenced document can here be inserted as a binary object.

Attribute.Name: Attached document Mime code
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The mime code of the attached document.

Attribute.Name: Attached document filename
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The file name of the attached document.

Element.Name: External reference
Element.Description: BEAst: A reference to an attached document that is external to the document(s) being exchanged.

Element.Name: Address to internet resource
Element.Description: BEAst: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies the external object as an Internet resource.
BEAst: Identifying information for this item, assigned by the buyer.
BEAst: Identifying information for this item, assigned by the seller.

Element.Name: Manufacturers item identification
Element.Description: BEAst: Identifying information for this item, assigned by the manufacturer.

Element.Name: Manufacturers item identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Manufacturers article number
BEAst: Only one StandardItemIdentification can be used per line.
BEAst: Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) or other standardized identification.

Element.Name: Commodity classification
Element.Description: BEAst: To classify when an item number is not sufficient.

Attribute.Description: BEAst: The identification scheme identifier of the Item classification identifier.
BEAst: The name of the Identification scheme identifier when @listID = ZZZ. Must be provided when @listID = ZZZ.

Element.Description: BEAst: Contains information on the Hazardous item.

Element.Name: Identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: An identifier for this hazardous item.

Element.Name: Technical Name
Element.Description: BEAst: The full technical name of a specific hazardous substance contained in this goods item.
Element.Value: Corrosive liquid, n.o.s., 8, UN 1760, II (contains Octanoyl chloride)

Element.Name: Category Name
Element.Description: BEAst: The name of the category of hazard that applies to the Item.

Element.Name: Hazardous Category Code
Element.Description: BEAst: A code signifying a kind of hazard for a material.

Element.Name: Net Weight Measure
Element.Description: BEAst: Net weight of the Hazardous item.

Attribute.Name: Measure unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to the Net Weight.

Element.Name: Net Volume Measure
Element.Description: BEAst: Net volume of the Hazardous item.

Attribute.Name: Measure unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to the Net Volume.

Element.Name: Hazardous Goods Transit
Element.Description: BEAst: Information related to the transit of this kind of hazardous goods.

Element.Name: Packing Criteria Code
Element.Description: BEAst: A code signifying the packaging requirement for transportation of the hazardous goods as assigned by IATA, IMDB, ADR, RID etc.

Element.Name: Emergency Temperature
Element.Description: BEAst: The threshold temperature at which emergency procedures apply in the handling of temperature-controlled goods.

Element.Name: Attribute ID
Element.Description: BEAst: An identifier for this temperature measurement.

Element.Name: Measure
Element.Description: BEAst: The value of this temperature measurement.

Attribute.Name: Measure unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to the Emergency Temperature.

Element.Description: BEAst: ID of the property if assigned by an Agency

Attribute.Name: Name code list id.
Attribute.Description: BEAst: An identifier for the code list used for the Name code, this is bilaterally agreed

Element.Name: Manufacturer party
Element.Description: BEAst: The manufacturer of this item.

Element.Name: Manufacturer party identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Identifies the manufacturer party.

Element.Name: Manufacturer party name
Element.Description: BEAst: The name of the manufacturer party.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: BEAst: The address for the manufacturer.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: BEAst: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: BEAst: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: BEAst: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: BEAst: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: BEAst: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: BEAst: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: BEAst: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Manufacturer party legal name
Element.Description: BEAst: The legal name of the manufacturing party.
BEAst: Adding information on individual instances of the item.

Element.Name: Item manufactured time
Element.Description: BEAst: The time at which this item instance was manufactured. Timezone is optional to use. If omitted, the local timezone where the manufacturing was made should be assumed.

Element.Name: Item serial number.
Element.Description: BEAst: Serial number for item listed in the despatch line..

Element.Name: Certificate
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for referring to the Certificates for the product.

Element.Name: Identity of the certificate
Element.Description: BEAst: Certificate number.

Element.Name: Certificate type code
Element.Description: BEAst: Code that specifies the certificate type expressed as a code. Use the value NA if not applicabel.

Element.Name: Certificate type
Element.Description: BEAst: Identifies the type of certificate.

Element.Name: Remarks
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to inform about how much is certified, in percent.

Element.Name: Issuer party
Element.Description: BEAst: The authorized organization that issued this certificate, the provider of the certificate.

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: BEAst: The name of the party issuing the certificate.

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: BEAst: The UBL structure used requires this element. Use the value NA if not applicable.

Element.Name: Measurement Dimension
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to specify any dimension of the Item.

Element.Name: Attribute identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: To describe the type of measurement.

Element.Name: Measure
Element.Description: BEAst: For the measure.

Attribute.Name: Measure unit of measure
Attribute.Description: BEAst: The unit of measure that applies to the measure.
